name: Onloop
description: OnLoop is a habit-forming, genAI-powered goals and feedback platform for high-performing teams. Utilizing the proprietary Collaborative Team Development (CTD) framework, it enhances well-being, clarity, feedback, and growth. OnLoop offers a fun, easy-to-use app proven effective for tech start-ups and agencies in the US and APAC, especially in hybrid setups. Users report improved feedback sharing, proactive improvement, and easier progress tracking for managers.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Leveraging AI to convert every manager into a good manager

enhanced_description: OnLoop is a generative AI-powered platform for goals and feedback, designed to foster habit formation within high-performing teams. Utilizing its proprietary Collaborative Team Development (CTD) framework, it focuses on enhancing well-being, clarity, feedback, and growth. The platform simplifies performance reviews and encourages day-to-day reflection, aiming to leverage AI to convert every manager into an effective leader. It has proven effective for tech start-ups and agencies, particularly in hybrid setups across the US and APAC. Users have reported improved feedback sharing, proactive improvement, and easier progress tracking for managers, while also boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity. OnLoop also offers supplementary services like 1-on-1 executive coaching for CEOs, manager training programs, and leadership offsite facilitation, including workshops for organization leaders focusing on vision and goals.
